EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Organic Valued Client Plan - Please "Accept"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Client_First_Name__c},
This email confirms that Customer is extending the Yodle Organic Service Commitment Period by an additional six (6) months, as set forth herein. As noted below, to accept the terms and conditions of this Change Order, please reply to this e-mail with "Accept" in the body.
This Change Order changes the Agreement in effect between Yodle and Customer.
The Yodle Organic Service Commitment Period is extended by an additional six (6) months and will continue month to month thereafter until the Agreement is terminated or Customer cancels the Yodle Organic Service. Customer may not cancel the Yodle Organic Service during the Yodle Organic Service Commitment Period.
The monthly fee for the Yodle Organic Service, as amended by this Change Order, will be $399 per month, effective as of effective as of the first day of Customer’s next billing period.
Except as modified by this Change Order, all of the terms and provisions of the Agreement remain in full force and effect.
This Change Order becomes effective on the date accepted by Customer. Customer accepts this Change Order by replying to this e-mail with “Accept”. This action creates an electronic signature that has the same legal force and effect as a handwritten signature on a written contract under any applicable law or regulation, and is equally binding.
Please contact your Yodle sales representative if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
Yodle Contracts Team contracts@yodle.com
